think_procedure: 1. Identify the purpose of the 'wal_level' knob in PostgreSQL. 2. Determine the possible values it can take, which include 'minimal', 'replica', and 'logical'. 3. Check if any of these values are special values like -1 or 0. 4. Assess whether setting the knob to any of these values significantly changes its function or disables a feature. 5. Conclude whether 'wal_level' fits the criteria of a special knob.
